lines: 1. O there'll be joy when the work is done, Joy when the reapers gather home, Bringing the sheaves at set of sun To the New Jerusalem.
Refrain : Joy, joy, there'll be joy by and by, Joy, joy, where the joys never die; Joy, joy; for the day draweth nigh When the workers gather home.
2. Sweet are the songs that we hope to sing, Grateful the thanks our hearts shall bring, Praising forever Christ our King In the New Jerusalem.
3. Pure are the joys that awaitus there Many the golden mansions fair; Jesus Himself doth them prepare, In the New Jerusalem.
